price: All praise be to Allah Who has sent down upon His slave the Book, and has not allowed any crookedness therein[1],
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ
footnotes: [1] From the straight path or from the truth.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
